html:
3.25.20  7:44 pm   3.25.20  4:30 am   what is "a tempo"

     that is italian, and it means "in time" .... You will see this if the music has been beatless (tempoless) with no beat for a while (that would be called 'rubato') ... and then when the beat starts, it would be 'a tempo'

3.25.20  7:18 pm   does your brain get tired of thinking

     not if i am allowed also to feel

3.25.20  7:17 pm   Hey Bill, why do you have 240 hanging up on your wall? What is the significance of that number to you?

     i liked it much better than 420, which is what it said when i found it

3.25.20  7:02 pm   Is scientology the study of scientists?

     no

     fucking enormous. so spectacular

     i want to believe you

     of course

3.25.20  3:29 pm   Is magic real?

     yes

     Can I eat it?

     sometimes. here is a good guideline you can use each and every day: all food is magic, but not all magic is food

3.25.20  3:28 pm   gotta do it on my own

     that makes sense

3.25.20  2:33 pm   Story time bill! So I just got a girlfriend, and whenever I was asked how I felt about it, I couldn't help but respond that "I'm bobbling down 124th street". Then I got to visit NYC last month, and what do you know - my hotel was on 121st so I walked the 3 blocks and literally got to bobble down 124th street! Thoughts?

     i bet you are glad you went last month instead of this month

3.25.20  2:32 pm   how does gravity exist?

     i blame destiny

3.25.20  2:07 pm   How to stop wanting to stop?

     start wanting to not stop. which is great news, because you are already doing both

3.25.20  1:56 pm   How do you deal with the fear of tomorrow?

     capture and document it into a high quality horror story. if it turns out not to be scary, then your story will be ruined but at least your day will be less scary

3.25.20  1:25 pm   Is the earth flat 

     no, it has a lot of hills

3.25.20  1:18 pm   do you ever sleep? it looks like you answer ueqstions all day every day

     that might be because you are assuming the time next to the question is when i answered it

3.25.20  1:15 pm   Do you think random = funny?

     nothing is funny

     have you considered trying some feelings

     it is your job, to make up a way

- thank

     holy caldwell, Friendship cometh

3.25.20  11:14 am   How do I stop caring about what people think of me?

     start thinking things of them

3.25.20  10:38 am   Hi Bill, I have a real problem with postponing. Do you have any insights on how to better yourself in that sense?

     it depends whether you would like to be better at postponing, or worse at it

3.25.20  10:20 am   How do you set time for yourself? 

     i have some clocks

3.25.20  9:54 am   A good book on creativity and spontaneity I was reading recently by Keith Johnstone said that to be creative you need to be as ordinary and unoriginal as possible.

     ah, reverse psychology

      He highly criticized arts schools since they teach everyone to be clever, and to obey and copy the masters,

     wait hold on, since when is it clever to obey and copy

      when in actuality, the more obvious and direct someone appears, the more original he's going to be.

     yes that can be true

      Do you think he's on the right track?

     from your summary i am hearing 2 or 3 different tracks there

3.25.20  9:50 am   DO YOU EVER WRITE IN UPPERCASE

     yes, especially in my videos

3.25.20  9:35 am   U gonna post a video tomorrow? 

     no

3.25.20  9:23 am   How come your notebook is so funky? Is there a secret message?

     yes, the secret message is that writing text is a viable way to express things coming out of your brain, and it has a way quicker production time than almost any other creative endeavor

     might be the stanley cup

     they are for real

     i don't know

     well, now i guess it's granola bars

     not necessary. no factors

3.25.20  4:32 am   I've been working on a book and want to know how do you deal with creativity block and the fear of not living up to expectations?

     it might be useful to remember that all the greatest artists (you can decide or not decide who they are) have dealt with this fear over and over again. congratulations, you now have something in common with the world's greatest artists

3.25.20  4:30 am   what is a tempo

     how fast the pulse of the music is. usually measured in "bpm" which means beats per minute. that's how many beats would occur per minute

3.25.20  4:27 am   Why is water?

     scientists continue to debate, to this day

     that's terrible news

     i am currently making some long overdue developments and adjustments in the video department
